div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SubstitutionCondition where concept is-a _Conditional

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SubstitutionCondition
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ConditionalConditionalSome conditions may be attached to an allowable substitution. An allowable substitution is based on a match to any other attributes that may be specified.

description.value: Some conditions may be attached to an allowable substitution. An allowable substitution is based on a match to any other attributes that may be specified.
